markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shoony Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1219) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

Growing up in shoony society, you learned the value of honesty, friendship, and hard work, even during trying times. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Shoony Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Shoony Lore
